bilingual.source: The effects of smog on the environment.

bilingual.target: 我们的环境正在受到破坏。
环境处于极大的危险中。
我只是不喜欢那里的环境。

bilingual.source: Paper bags are not good for the environment.

bilingual.target: 我们绝不应该污染环境。

bilingual.source: Both kinds of bags are bad for the environment.
bilingual.target: 两种袋子对环境都不好。

list.abstract: Environment，英文单词，作名词，翻译为环境、外界。

yingyinNormal.en: I think going green is more about the environment Sophie.
yingyinNormal.zh: 苏菲，我觉得绿化主要是指在环境方面。

yingyinNormal.en: So we're actually improving the environment while we're making electricity.
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以我们在发电的同时也要改善环境。

yingyinNormal.en: What about the environment, you ask? Without a doubt, new dryers are the environmentally friendly option.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你或许会问，那环境问题呢？没错，在环境保护方面，烘手机是比较好的选择。

yingyinNormal.en: Now, if this experiment is going to be valid, I suggest a neutral environment.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果要让这个实验有效，我建议我跟她得住在中立环境。

yingyinNormal.en: You compare yourself to what's easily imaginable and easily available in the current environment.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你会同在这个环境下容易想象跟接触的事物比较。

yingyinNormal.en: Our awareness has evolved. We are worried about the issue of the environment. But that's not yet enough.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们的意识在增强，我们关心环境问题，但这还不够。

yingyinNormal.en: Chrissy is suing us? And Diane. And the firm. For what? For a hostile work environment.
yingyinNormal.zh: 克里斯要告我们？还有戴安，还有这家律所。为什么？因为敌意的工作环境。

yingyinNormal.en: A place that defies its extreme environment, and redefines everything we think we know about cities.
yingyinNormal.zh: 迪拜克服了当地的极端气候环境，并重新定义其他人对这城市的印象。

yingyinNormal.en: No, Cam, I don't know if this is the most supportive environment for Lily to... I agree. Let's get her out of the show.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不，小卡，我不知道这种环境是不是对莉莉有帮助。我同意，我们带她出去吧。

yingyinNormal.en: I still can't believe this. My uterus is an inhospitable environment? I've always tried so hard to be a good hostess.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我还是无法相信，我的子宫是不适宜着床的环境？我一直都很努力想要当个称职的女主人。

yingyinNormal.en: Expectations can be created by all kinds of things, names, environment and sometimes even things that they shouldn't be influenced by expectations.
yingyinNormal.zh: 期望可以产生在各种事物环境下有时候，甚至是本不该产生期望的事情。

yingyinNormal.en: When you think about protecting the environment, the last thing that comes to mind is digging a giant coal mine in the middle of pristine ranch land.
yingyinNormal.zh: 当你想着要保护环境时，肯定不会想在原始的牧场上挖一个巨大的煤矿。

yingyinNormal.en: And, one day soon, an army of Yellowjackets will create a sustainable environment of well-being around the world. The Yellowjacket.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不久的将来，一个黄蜂战衣的军队将会在全世界创造出一个幸福安康的可持续环境，黄蜂战衣。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, you know what? No. Lily will be fine, 'cause she's gonna have the chance to thrive in a more supportive environment. Yeah, you don't need to worry about she.
yingyinNormal.zh: 知道吗？不，莉莉会很好的，因为她会在一个更有爱的环境里有蓬勃发展的机会。是啊，你没必要担心她。

yingyinNormal.en: According to data from the European Space Agency's Gravity field and steady-state Ocean Circulation Explorer satellite, the loss of polar ice to climate change is affecting the gravitational environment.
yingyinNormal.zh: 来自欧洲太空署地球重力场和海洋环流探测卫星的数据，气候变迁导致极区的冰融化，影响了引力环境。

yingyinNormal.en: Wow! Talk about an inhospitable environment.
yingyinNormal.zh: 糟糕！说的话还真不受欢迎。

yingyinNormal.en: And it turns out that the Earth's gravitational environment isn't constant in its variety, either.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但地心引力在各种变化中似乎也不是一直很稳定。

yingyinNormal.en: The Aquascum is programmed to scan your tank environment every five minutes. Scan? What does that mean?
yingyinNormal.zh: 水得清设定为每五分钟扫瞄一次你的鱼缸。扫瞄?那是什么意思？

yingyinNormal.en: What we're worried about is that we have created an environment in which you feel it's necessary to... embelli... fanta... exagger...
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们担心的是我们营造出来的这种氛围让你觉得有必要...修...虚...夸...

yingyinNormal.en: Well, evolutionary biology says that women are attracted to a man who is steady in the face of danger, so I recommend an unsafe environment.
yingyinNormal.zh: 进化生物学说，女人容易被临危不乱的男人所吸引，所以我建议去危险的地方。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: The key messages that have been put together for World <highlight>Environment</highlight> Day do include a call for governments to enact legislation to curb single-use plastics.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为世界环境日收集的重要信息确实包括呼吁各国政府制定法律限制一次性塑料。

examination_example.sentence: No matter how formal or informal the work <highlight>environment</highlight>, the way you present yourself has an impact.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 无论工作环境是正式还是非正式，你表现自己的方式都会产生影响。

examination_example.sentence: Look at your work <highlight>environment</highlight> like an anthropologist.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 像人类学家一样看待你的工作环境。

sense_info_list.en: the natural world in which people, animals and plants live

examination_example.sentence: Such programs do not have to negatively affect the <highlight>environment</highlight>, though.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不过，这样的项目不一定会对自然环境产生负面影响。

examination_example.sentence: But CCT programs don't generally consider effects on the <highlight>environment</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但有条件现金资助的项目通常不考虑对自然环境的影响。

examination_example.sentence: It's important to acknowledge that the <highlight>environment</highlight> isn't everyone's priority – or even most people's.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 重要的是要承认环境不是每个人的优先考虑事项——甚至不是大多数人的优先考虑事项。

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 去动词化的抽象名词后缀, 通常表示"某种行为或结果"

word_usage.usage: environment既可作可数名词，又可作不可数名词。the environment特指自然环境，其后的谓语动词要用第三人称单数形式。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 专指自然环境，也可指精神环境，均从环境对人的感受，道德及观念的影响着眼。
常指“背景、环境”(= surroundings or environment on stage)。
指某事或动作发生时的“情况”。
专指自然环境，从周围的事物这一客体着眼。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: n. 生态环境；自然环境；环境；条件

sense_info_list.en: the surroundings or conditions in which a person, animal, or plant lives or operates

examination_example.sentence: The study's report states that as global warming transforms the <highlight>environment</highlight> in the world's last great wilderness,.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 研究报告指出，全球变暖改变了世界上最后一片大荒野的环境。

examination_example.sentence: According to the company's CEO, Rose Marcario, this is about building a company that cares about the <highlight>environment</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 该公司首席执行官 (CEO) Rose Marcario 表示，巴塔哥尼亚正努力建设成为一家心系环境，注重环保的服装公司。

examination_example.sentence: Perhaps my expectations of caring, deep-and-meaningful conversations were a legacy of the last time I was in that kind of office <highlight>environment</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我对那些关心他人、深入而有意义的交谈依旧十分期待。这也许是我在之前的办公环境下养成的习惯，遗留下来的。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

examination_example.sentence: Although in-flight infections thrive in dry <highlight>environments</highlight> like airplanes, your risk of getting sick from an airplane is actually low because of the air filters used.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尽管在飞机等干燥环境中飞行中感染很普遍，但由于使用了空气过滤器，因此在飞机上生病的风险实际上很低。

examination_example.sentence: "How tall we are now is strongly influenced by the <highlight>environment</highlight> we grew up in, " he said.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他说：“我们的身高很大程度上受到成长环境的影响。”

examination_example.sentence: Teachers should aim to build a supportive, creative <highlight>environment</highlight> for students to do this work. A very social <highlight>environment</highlight>, where they are learning from each other.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 要做到这一点，教师应该致力于为学生营造一个支持性的、创造性的环境。一个社交互动性强的环境，学生们在其中互相学习。

examination_example.sentence: You can make your <highlight>environment</highlight> work for you instead of against you.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你可以让环境对你有利，而不是不利。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。
